title: A Step From the Edge
description: Eighteen-year-old high school senior Leah Castro doesn't believe in love at first sight. But hate at first sight? She knew it was real the moment she laid eyes on her new step-brother, Asher Layton.Staying in the Castro family home following his release from a three-year prison sentence, Ash is everything Leah despises in a rude, arrogant, macho and unrefined . He's also gorgeous , with sandy-blonde hair , a sculpted physique and a cocksure grin that drives women wild. But Leah would never fall for a guy like that...Or so she thought. After a run-in with two sadistic bikers , Leah begins to learn more about her stepbrother’s secret history in an outlaw motorcycle club . She soon discovers that there’s much more to him than his bad boy façade suggests. As forbidden love blossoms, Ash’s MC rivals are closing in to exact revenge for the incident three years ago that landed him behind bars. Will the step-siblings find happiness together , despite the odds stacked against them?Find out in Aurora Sparks's debut novella, a tale rife with romance, eroticism, suspense and white-knuckle action!
author: Aurora Sparks
